name: agljs
description: A lightweight TypeScript framework for integrating web apps with Epic's Active Guidelines (AGL) platform. Manage action queuing, event handling, subscriptions, and state within Epic Hyperspace via cross-domain messaging.
author: Joshua Faulkenberry <j@joshuafaulkenberry.com> (https://joshuafaulkenberry.com/)

scripts.publish patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish major: npm run build && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
